snippet: When Cedar Lake Contemporary Ballet was founded in New York in 2003 by the Walmart heiress Nancy Laurie, it was generally regarded in the dance world as a rich woman's folly. So much for the naysayers: The company has developed a reputation as the...
abstract: When Cedar Lake Contemporary Ballet was founded in New York in 2003 by the Walmart heiress Nancy Laurie, it was generally regarded in the dance world as a rich woman's folly. So much for the naysayers: The company has developed a reputation as the purveyor of new and interesting European choreography.

headline.main: Cedar Lake Ballet Makes a Brief, Well-Chosen Stop at Sadler's Wells
